name: Association Internationale de la Savonnerie, de la Détergence et des Produits d'Entretien
goal:
A.I.S.E. seeks to play a proactive role in favour of Sustainability by running industry voluntary initiatives in this field.
Its second main field of action consists in activities for its members such as scientific studies in relation to detergents, information and expertise about EU policies, mainly in the field of environment and consumer safety.
The last field of action of A.I.S.E., which is carried out on a need-basis only, is to respond to request from the EU Institution and provide scientific and technical data in relation with the development of legislation.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Institutional affairs, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Transport
euInitiatives:
Chemicals legislation: e.g. CLP Regulation, Detergents Regulation, Biocidal Products Regulation, "Seveso Directive".

Environmental Regulation: Eco-design, PEF initiative, Circular Economy


Consumer safety
